page.title: 20Then and Now.
page.content: The main changes that have taken place in the area in recent times have been as follows. Houses have improved. They now have lots of machines to do the work. The railway line is closed and is now the Speyside Way. Roads are wider and better surfaced and more people have cars. There used to be more shops like tailors and shoe makers. Now that people are doing some of their shopping elsewhere there are not so many shops. There have been a lot of new houses built recently. There used to be no unemployment in the place. Everyone had some job to do.
